existing_features.title: Update the resident medications UI to display active medications and discontinued medications in separate, clearly labeled tables/sections (do not use strikethrough/crossed-out styling for discontinued medications).
Ensure the resident profile page Medications tab also shows discontinued medications in a separate section/table (currently it only lists active medications).

new_feature_requests.summary: Show discontinued medications in resident medication list in a separate table instead of crossing them out

projectName: Show discontinued medications in a separate table on the resident medication list
